Line.MultilineString: You arrive at the crux of the ancient sewer network, a vast room filled with mold and water. As you enter the room something large moves, drawn to the sound of your feet and the flickering of your torch.
The beast crushes you, you broken body being consumed by its foul maw.

You slay the creature, overcoming you disgust at it foul, mutated body. From within a powerful soul flows out, coalescing into a solid crystal in your hands. Someone may be able to do something with this.

Item.Name: Life Crystal of the Rotting Dragon
